name: DiastolicBloodPressureLOINC
title: Diastolic Blood Pressure LOINC
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes representing measurement of a patient's diastolic blood pressure.  The codes used are LOINC codes.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify the measurement of the diastolic blood pressure in a patient.  Using the Quality Data Model, this data element maps to the Physical exam, finding category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Only include codes representing the measurement of diastolic blood pressure using LOINC code system.),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclude any codes which do not represent an observation or measurement of diastolic blood pressure in LOINC code system.)
